channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bus Stop G in Gravel Hill has lots of glass on footpath, 30th September
item.description:
Bus Stop G in Gravel Hill has lots of glass on footpath - resident reporting it is dangerous as glass scattered on footpath near school, and elderly residents and children use this route. Glass panel on bus shelter has been fixed but contractors have left glass on footway. Please can this be looked into ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Hill, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffitti, 30th September
item.description:
Please remove Graffiti from our metal shutter at 284 Harrow Road, London, W2 5ES - Landmark Legal Solicitors, we have previously reported Graffitti on 22.07.25 and to date no one attended to remove it. Our office is open 10am to 5pm Monday to Friday so outside these hours the metal shutter is down for the Graffitti removal. Please can you action this urgently as we pay high council rates every month, this is basic service that council should therefore supply swiftly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Aldridge Road Villas, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
